Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: enjoy st lucia
Reviews.Content: The phone meets my expectations for a device of this price. It has a sharp bright screen which is responsive but scratches easily (although it looks like it has a screen protector installed). The phone had no problems  recognising both sims and offers options on which  sim to use for any particular phone call and which sim to assign for your data plan. I had no problems with connecting with wifi and phone calls  are loud and clear. The phone comes with some chinese apps installed but can access google play store or Amazon app store to download apps of your choice. I am not yet able to delete the cheezy home screen that is pre installed but it offers a few other (better)choices. Battery life is great (more than 24 hours) when wifi is off, but lasts only about 6-8 hours with wifi on. I like the idea of the 2nd battery which is included although I have never had any reason to use it. For all you android newbies, there is a learning curve so it may take you a while to discover all the features of this phone. Note that this is a 2G only phone so while I am ok with it, it might not be suitable for everyone. What I like least about this phone is that the keys for typing are a little small so i constantly have to correct my letters - otherwise the phone is well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Melissa Montilla
Reviews.Content: When i first saw it, i was impressed about how cool this phone really is, after 3 weeks i'm still amazed. Totally worth THE WAIT! 100% Recommended!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Nicole Goeller
Reviews.Content: Only a couple complaints so far, the camera sucks even with the flash it's very dark and has a yellowish tint.  Also forget about using the phone while it's charging with the included charger.  I had to contact the seller because the phone was going crazy and i couldn't make selections.  But I used an old charger of my own and so far so good.  The seller was willing to accept the item back though and responded promptly.  The keyboard is sort of smaller than usual and the speaker phone and playing any type of audio isn't very loud.  Other than that I guess I got my moneys worth.

Reviews.Title: great phone minor problem
Reviews.Author: Jerneil Tobias
Reviews.Content: this phone is a great phone the specs on this phone is excellent just one problem I cant find any screen protector for it other than that its a great phone.

Reviews.Title: On/Off swith and touch screen issues
Reviews.Author: R. Ellington Smith
Reviews.Content: I have issues with the touch screed and on/off switch not working correctly.  Other than that the unit is just like my Samsung Galaxy III.

Reviews.Title: Well Worth What I Paid
Reviews.Author: Adrienne
Reviews.Content: I was definitely wary when I saw 2G but it seems to work just fine with my 4G provider. The OS is 4.2.2 as expected and it runs quickly and cleanly. All in all, I was definitely impressed. My only complaint is the random Chinese notifications that will appear without warning and seem to come from apps that aren't even installed on my phone.

ProductInfo.Features:
4.5inch capacitive touch screen, 854 x 480 pixels
MTK6517 Dual core CPU, Cortex- A9 1.0GHz
Dual SIM Card Dual Standby
Android 4.1.1 OS, compatible with most new apps
2.0MP back camera and 0.3MP front camera, with flashlight, up to 1600x1200 pixels picture resolution
ProductInfo.Name: Cubot C10 Dual Core 4.5 inch Android 4.1 Dual SIM Dual Standby Smartphone Cell phone Mobile Phone (White)
